DOC.detailed_description: Roles responsibilities 1 . Nora Helmy Hasaneen ( N.H. ) : Operator , data enterer correspond author ; Assistant lecturer fix Prosthodontics Department , Faculty Dentistry , Modern Technology Institution ( MTI ) University , Egypt . 2 . Dr. Ahmed Naguib Hussin ( A.H. ) : Main supervisor , data monitoring auditing ; Professor fix Prosthodontics , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine- Cairo University , Egypt . 3 . Dr.Gihan Al-Naggar ( A. G. ) : Co-Supervisor , data monitoring auditing ; Professor fix Prosthodontics , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine -Cairo University , Egypt . 3.Esraa Mohamed Odeuh ( E.O . ) : Outcome assessor data collection ; Assistant lecturer , Fixed Prosthodontics Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , MTI University , Egypt . 4.Ahmed Gamal ( A.G ) : Base line data collection , recruitment , sequence generation , allocation concealment , patient retention take participant ' consent ; Resident Fixed Prosthodontics Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , MTI University , Egypt . 5.Eman Desouky ( E.D . ) : Sample size calculation ; Statistician , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 6 . Evidence Based Dentistry Committee ( CEBD ) Help report study protocol follow SPIRIT guideline ; Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 7.Research Ethics Committee ( CREC ) : Protocol reviewer clinical trial order protect right , safety , dignity well-being participant ; Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 8 . Research Plan Committee ( CRPC ) : For ensure clinical trial follow department research plan ; Fixed prosthodontic Department , Faculty Oral Dental Medicine , Cairo University , Egypt . 1 . Intervention : N.H. perform conservative tooth preparation follow principle ceramic crown preparation shoulder subgingival finish line thickness 1.2mm use taper stone flat end attach high speed headpiece air water coolant , local anesthesia give . N.H. take adequate 2ry Impression use non aqueous Elastomeric impression material Impregum™F ( medium consistency , 3M ESPE , ) bite registration pink soft wax ( Stardentalsupply ) . N.A . & E.O . visually select shade match use Vita Easyshade Compact ( Vita Zahnfabrik , Bad Sa¨ckingen , Germany ) . N.H fabricate temporary restoration use Protemp™ 4 Temporisation Material ( 3M ESPE ) cement use non Eugenol Zinc Oxide temporary cement TempBond™ Temporization ( Kerrdentalsupply ) . N.H deliver Press Bio - HPP framework material veneer visio lign veneer material ( Bredent ) crown cement 3M™ ESPE™ RelyX™ Unicem Self-Adhesive Universal Resin Cement . 2 . Comparator N.H. perform conservative tooth preparation follow principle ceramic crown preparation shoulder subgingival finish line thickness 1.2mm use taper stone flat end attach high speed headpiece air water coolant , local anesthesia give . N.H. take adequate 2ry Impression use non aqueous Elastomeric impression material Impregum™F ( medium consistency , 3M ESPE , ) bite registration pink soft wax ( Stardentalsupply ) . N.A . & E.O . visually select shade match use Vita Easyshade Compact ( Vita Zahnfabrik , Bad Sa¨ckingen , Germany ) . N.H fabricate temporary restoration use Protemp™ 4 Temporisation Material ( 3M ESPE ) cement use non Eugenol Zinc Oxide temporary cement TempBond™ Temporization ( Kerrdentalsupply ) . N.H deliver E.max® framework veneer E-max veneer System ( Ivoclar Vivadent ) crown cement 3M™ ESPE™ RelyX™ Unicem Self-Adhesive Universal Resin Cement . 3 . Outcomes A . Primary outcome : Patient satisfaction : E.O measure patient satisfaction use Rating score . The mean standard deviation Rating score patient record time crown cementation , 3 , 6 , 9 & 12 month review aesthetic . B . Secondary outcome : Clinical assessment restoration : E.O evaluate shade matching , marginal discoloration surface texture use modify USPHS criterion score . The mean standard deviation USPHS criterion score patient record time crown cementation 0 , 3 , 6 , 9 & 12 month review aesthetic .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient able physically psychologically tolerate conventional restorative procedure . 2 . Patients active periodontal pulpal disease , teeth good restoration . 3 . Patient anterior tooth problem indicate full coverage restoration ( e.g . mild moderate discoloration , coronal fracture partial coverage would lack retention , malposed malformed teeth ) Patients willing return followup examination evaluation . 4 . Patient sound contralateral tooth select tooth require full coverage . 5 . Patient root canal treat tooth require full coverage restoration 1 . Patient growth stage partially erupt teeth . 2 . Patient poor oral hygiene motivation . 3 . Pregnant woman ` . 4 . Patient psychiatric problem unrealistic expectation . 5 . Patients oppose occlude dentition area intend restoration . 6 . Patients parafunctional habit . 7 . Color blindness patient exclude . 8 . Patient without contralateral tooth tooth restore . 9 . Patient without adjacent teeth tooth restore .
